com.unvired.ump.agent

Interface IActiveDirectoryRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUMPRequest, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IActiveDirectoryRequest
extends IUMPRequest
    The interface IActiveDirectoryRequest provides an abstraction to submit an authentication request to an Active Directory server 
     Sample code for authenticating a user in the ACMEDOMAIN.

 
 public void execute(IBusinessProcess process)
 {
 IActiveDirectoryRequest activeDirectoryRequest = (IActiveDirectoryRequest)process.createRequestObject(RequestType.ActiveDirectory);
 
 //Set the domain
 activeDirectoryRequest.setDomain("ACMEDOMAIN");
 
 //Set the domain user
 activeDirectoryRequest.setUser("USERNAME");
 
 //Set the password
 activeDirectoryRequest.setPassword("********");
 
 IActiveDirectoryResponse activeDirectoryResponse = process.getService().submitActiveDirectoryRequest(activeDirectoryRequest, "COMPANY_NAMESPACE", "FUNCTION_NAME");
 }
